sentences.cn: 阿拉, 佛祖, 耶稣基督.

sentences.en: And Allah will defend thee from men ( who mean mischief ) .
sentences.cn: 真 主将 保佑你免遭众人的杀害.

sentences.en: But speak to him mildly ; perchance he may take warning or fear ( Allah ).
sentences.cn: 你俩对他说话要温和,或许他会 记取 教诲,或者有所畏惧.

sentences.en: He has returned to Allah. We shouldn't be too sad.
sentences.cn: 他已经归真, 我们不必太过悲伤.

sentences.en: Here is a plain statement to men, a guidance and instruction to those who Allah!
sentences.cn: 这是对于世人的一种宣示,也是对于敬畏者的一种向导和教训.

sentences.en: I really believe that Allah made me this way, he said.
sentences.cn: 我真的相信是Allah神把我弄成这个样子的.

sentences.en: Therefore expound openly what thou art commanded, and turnfrom those who join false gods with Allah.
sentences.cn: 你应当公开宣布你所奉的命令, 而且避开以物配主者.

sentences.en: Verily Allah will judge between them as amongst them, on the Day of Judgment.
sentences.cn: 复活日,你的主必将判决他们所争论的是非.

trans.tran_en: Allah is the name of God in Islam
